# members()

**Instance Method**

Returns an array of persons in a group.

## Declaration

```swift
func members() -> [Any]!
```

## Discussion

If this group doesn’t contain any people, this method returns an empty array.

## Managing persons

- **addMember(_:)**: Adds a person to a group.
- **removeMember(_:)**: Removes a person from a group.
